title: ðŸš¨ Tom Brady is leaving the Patriots after 20 years and 6 Super Bowls - Emergency Podcast (Football 3/17)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by CBS Sports NFL writer Tyler Sullivan to react to the somewhat expected but still stunning news that Tom Brady is leaving the Patriots. The guys discuss Brady's announcement, the reasons he's not returning, which team he will sign with in free agency, who New England will replace him at quarterback with and much more.
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Castbox, Bullhorn and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â

itunes:subtitle: Tom Brady announced on Tuesday morning that he will leave the Patriots and join another team next season. Will Brinson and Tyler Sullivan digest the news and predict what's next.
